about_the_game:
Tides of Tethys is an immersive underwater roguelite simulation game centered around exploring and surviving the uncharted depths of an alien world, while building and maintaining modular outposts.

Players will lead expeditions of Knights into the unknown, in the hopes of rebuilding their long lost kingdom and unifying the houses of Tethys once again.

As they dive further into the Abyss, they will discover compelling new places, uncover lost technologies, and conquer a variety of dangers that lurk beneath the surface.

Features :

  • Explore an ever changing procedural world, where no two expeditions are the same, and delve deeper into the uncharted trenches of the Abyss
  • Build modular outposts, and transport parts of it with in your Mothership to help you survive the challenges of the deep
  • Discover ancient Relics to uncover lost technology for your outposts as well as tools and vehicles for your Knights
  • During each expedition, choose between meaningful perks to help you survive the trenches
  • Rebuild your Kingdom to its former glory! With each victorious expedition, unlock more perks, tools, factions and customizations
  • Whether it's conditions like darkness, changing current speeds or simply running into events that require you to make snap decisions... What will you do, faced against the unknown?


    DISCOVER THE WORLD OF TETHYS

    The world of Tethys is a dangerous and diverse one.
    With each expedition comes new locations to discover, and with each depth, new challenges to overcome!



    EXPLORE AND ADAPT

    As an expedition leader, you will lead your trusted Knights to explore and retrieve long-lost Relics from the ancient wars that divided the Houses of Tethys..
    Retrieving Relics will allow you to retrofit that technology on your outposts, as well as your Knights and let you adapt to the ever growing challenges of the deep!



    CONQUER THE ABYSS, YOUR WAY

    With each conquest and failure comes knowledge and rewards!
    Will you unlock more ways to navigate the tides, upgrade your mothership to carry over more of your outpost each depth, or maybe try out a run with a newly unlocked House, offering its own set of advantages and challenges?
